attributes.action: Have traffic lights at the Queens road roundabout Erith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The roundabout which has the mosaic fish inthe middle in Queens road Erith leads off to queens road, bexley road, walnut tree road and bronze age way. This roundabout gets very busy and sometimes takes up to 20 minutes to get out of a turning especially bexley road where the traffic in that road mounts up enormously.
I would like to see traffic lights installed as they have done on the Northend Road/Perry Street roundabout (Ford crayford).

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
